downtown.name: Downtown
downtown.description: Towering skyscrapers and luxury apartments dominate the skyline. The air hums with power and ambition.

neon_district.name: Neon District
neon_district.description: A vibrant, chaotic district buzzing with nightlife. Music spills from every doorway.

industrial_zone.name: Industrial Zone
industrial_zone.description: A gritty, working-class area of factories and warehouses. The smell of metal and sweat hangs in the air.

the_plaza.name: The Plaza
the_plaza.description: An open-air plaza with a grand fountain at its center. A place for the public to gather.

slick_the_bartender.name: Slick, the Bartender
slick_the_bartender.dialogue: 'What can I get for you? See a lot of faces in here. Some win, some lose. The city always collects.'
